# Programmatic access {#programmatic-access}

The [`teRcen`](https://github.com/tercen/teRcen)  R package on the tercen github allows complete programmatic control. Any functionality available graphically in Tercen is also available pro grammatically. This includes, for example:

* uploading data
* computing data
* creating groups and users
* creating projects
* creating workflows and operators

For the full API please refer to the [teRcen R package](https://github.com/tercen/teRcen)
